Texts.Chs: 与氦离子组织打交道总是有风险的。我母亲经常雇用这些刺客中的的一个人来消灭她的政治对手，但我是第一次这样做。我承认，我有点激动。
Texts.Eng: Dealing with Helions is always risky business. My mother would often hire one of these creatures to keep political rivals in their place, but this is my first time. I admit, I feel something of a thrill.

Texts.Chs: 要成为太阳之子，狡猾与强壮缺一不可。没有增强药剂，大喙比我更具有优势。也许她自己会使药剂。我不能冒险。我的听差被我遣离这个世界，去和某个氦离子成员联系。
Texts.Eng: To become a Sunborn, one must be cunning as well as strong. Without my formula, Larbeaks has an edge over me. Perhaps she will take it herself. I cannot risk this. My manservant has been sent off-world, to make contact with a certain Helion.
